de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.monitor

Class ProgressMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.monitor.AMonitor
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job.monitor.ProgressMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMonitor

    public class ProgressMonitor
extends AMonitor
    Control object for IJobs. Can be used to check for cancel request, display job progress, and calling intermediate functions.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter
